fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
1. Participation to the Multi-Stakeholder Expert group on eProxurement (EXEP), leveraging the experience of Mr. Leontaridis in the e-SENS and PEPPOL Large Scale Projects and his involvement with the OpenPEPPOL AISBL as the Executive Support Officer, part of the Operating Office. 
 
2. Participation to the Stakeholder Communities operating under the CEF-Telecom Programme, focusing on the eDelivery, eID, eProcurement and eHealth DSIs 
 
3. Any other initiatives implementing the goals of the Digital Single Market
organisation_name: NETSMART - ANONYMI EMPORIKI ETAIRIA ANAPTYXIS KAI DIADOSIS YPIRESION KAI PROIONTON SE TOMEIS YPSILIS TECHNOLOGIAS (NETSMART)
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Multi-Stakeholders Expert Group on eProcurement#E03142#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3142#Member#C#Solutions and interoperability
goals__remit: NetSmart S.A as an organization and its CEO Eleftherios Leontaridis as a standalone consultant aim to provide services to public and/or private entities in order to support pan-European initiatives such as Large Scale Pilot projects, applications of the Connecting Europe facility and other similar initiatives, focusing on, but not limited to, the domains of eProcurement, eHealth, eID, Trust and Security, Business Information Exchange and more generally interoperability standards, solutions and governance models in eGovernment and eBusiness..
relevant_communication:
- PEPPOL Large Scale Pilot (ISU WP - Piloting Manager, 2009-2012) 
- e-SENS Large Scale Pilot (WP5 - Piloting Manager, 2013 - March 2017) 
- Executive Support Officer in the Operating Office of the OpenPEPPOL AISBL (2012 - end December 2017) 
- TOOP Large Scale Pilot (Once Only WP3 Piloting Manager, Jan.2017 - 2019)
